document.discussion_title: John Wood Group PLC (WG) to Release Earnings on Tuesday – sleekmoney
document.topic_text: Tweet John Wood Group PLC (LON:WG) is scheduled to be announcing its earnings results on Tuesday, August 16th. Investors that are interested in participating in the company’s conference call can do so using this link . A number of research firms have weighed in on WG. Goldman Sachs Group Inc. reiterated a “conviction sell” rating and issued a GBX 618.50 ($8.17) price target on shares of John Wood Group PLC in a research report on Friday, June 3rd. BNP Paribas reiterated a “neutral” rating and issued a GBX 695 ($9.18) price target on shares of John Wood Group PLC in a research report on Monday, June 27th. Barclays PLC reiterated an “overweight” rating on shares of John Wood Group PLC in a research report on Thursday, July 21st. JPMorgan Chase & Co. upped their price target on shares of John Wood Group PLC from GBX 545 ($7.20) to GBX 553 ($7.30) and gave the stock an “underweight” rating in a research report on Thursday, May 12th. Finally, Liberum Capital reiterated a “hold” rating and issued a GBX 612 ($8.08) price target on shares of John Wood Group PLC in a research report on Monday, April 25th. Three investment analysts have rated the stock with a sell rating, seven have given a hold rating and six have issued a buy rating to the company’s stock. John Wood Group PLC has a consensus rating of “Hold” and a consensus target price of GBX 649.58 ($8.58). Shares of John Wood Group PLC ( LON:WG ) opened at 738.00 on Friday. The stock’s market cap is GBX 2.73 billion. The stock’s 50 day moving average is GBX 678.34 and its 200 day moving average is GBX 634.91. John Wood Group PLC has a 52 week low of GBX 522.85 and a 52 week high of GBX 738.50. In other news, insider Brown,Jann M bought 1,296 shares of John Wood Group PLC stock in a transaction dated Tuesday, June 28th. The shares were acquired at an average price of GBX 643 ($8.49) per share, with a total value of £8,333.28 ($11,003.94). Also, insider Kemp,David sold 2,028 shares of the stock in a transaction on Thursday, June 30th. The shares were sold at an average price of GBX 675 ($8.91), for a total transaction of £13,689 ($18,076.06). This story was originally published by sleekmoney (http://sleekmoney.com) and is the sole property of sleekmoney. If you are reading this article on another website, that means this article was illegally copied and re-published to this website in violation of U.S. and International copyright law.
